INSERT INTO board(no, title, name, password, content) VALUES(#{no}, #{title}, #{name}, #{password}, #{content})

SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT rownum AS rnum, A.* FROM (SELECT no, title, name, decode (to_char(regdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), to_char(regdate, 'HH24:MI:SS'), to_char(regdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) as regdate, readcount FROM board ORDER BY no DESC) A) B WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startNum} AND #{endNum}
mapper.delete: DELETE board WHERE no=#{no} AND password=#{password}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM board
